name: All Better
description:
"All Better" is a horror puzzle visual novel.

You are a customer of All Better Solutions - a company that claims to improve mental well-being through virtual reality. However, things quickly take an ominous turn ...

A short game; takes approximately 15-30 minutes to complete.

Free to play - scroll to the bottom of this page, to the "Download" section.

A 3D game version of "All Better" is currently in development.

---

*** WARNINGS ***

- Contains mildly disturbing imagery

- Contains flashing imagery which may affect players with photosensitivities
